qrList.label: 暴风雪山庄模拟器
qrList.message:
/buttons labels=["查看属性","查看任务","查看记录","存活情况"] 暴风雪山庄模拟器 |
/setvar key=option ||
/if left=option rule=eq right="" {: /flushvar option | /abort :} ||
/if left=option rule=eq right="查看属性" {: /send "查看属性" :} ||
/if left=option rule=eq right="查看任务" {: /send "查看任务" :} ||
/if left=option rule=eq right="获得记录" {: /send "获得记录" :} ||
/if left=option rule=eq right="存活情况" {: /send "存活情况" :} ||
/trigger||
